Tsiku limenelo adzaimba nyimbo imeneyi m'dziko la Yuda, Ife tili ndi mudzi wolimba; Iye adzaika chipulumutso chikhale machemba ndi malinga.
Tsegulani pazipata, kuti mtundu wolungama, umene uchita zoonadi, ulowemo.
Inu mudzasunga mtima wokhazikika mu mtendere weniweni, chifukwa ukukhulupirirani Inu.
Khulupirirani Yehova nthawi yamuyaya, pakuti mwa Ambuye Yehova muli thanthwe lachikhalire.
Chifukwa Iye watsitsira pansi iwo amene anakhala pamwamba, mudzi wa pamsanje; Iye wautsitsa, wautsitsira pansi; waugwetsa pansi pa fumbi.
Phazi lidzaupondereza pansi; ngakhale mapazi a aumphawi, ndi mapondedwe a osowa.
Njira ya wolungama ili njira yoongoka; Inu amene muli woongoka, mukonza njira ya wolungama.
Inde m'njira ya maweruziro anu, Yehova, ife talindira Inu; moyo wathu ukhumba dzina lanu, ndi chikumbukiro chanu.
Ndi moyo wanga ndinakhumba Inu usiku; inde ndi mzimu wanga wa mwa ine ndidzafuna Inu mwakhama; pakuti pamene maweruziro anu ali pa dziko lapansi, okhala m'dziko lapansi adzaphunzira chilungamo.
Ungayanje woipa, koma sadzaphunzira chilungamo; m'dziko la machitidwe oongoka, iye adzangochimwa, sadzaona chifumu cha Yehova.
Yehova, dzanja lanu litukulidwa, koma iwo saona; koma iwo adzaona changu chanu cha kwa anthu, nadzakhala ndi manyazi; inde moto udzamaliza adani anu.
Yehova, mudzatikhazikitsira mtendere; pakuti mwatigwirira ntchito zathu zonse.
Yehova Mulungu wathu, pamodzi ndi Inu Ambuye ena adatilamulira ife; koma mwa Inu nokha tidzatchula dzina lanu.
Iwo afa, atha, sadzakhalanso ndi moyo; ali mizimu, sadzauka; chifukwa chake Inu munawazonda, ndi kuwaononga, mwathetsa chikumbukiro chao chonse.
Mwachulukitsa mtundu, Yehova, mwachulukitsa mtundu; Inu mwalemekezeka, mwakuza malire onse a dziko.
Yehova, iwo adza kwa Inu movutika, iwo anathira pemphero, muja munalikuwalanga.
Monga ngati mkazi wokhala ndi pakati, amene nthawi yake yakubala yayandikira, amva zopweteka, ndi kufuula m'zowawa zake; momwemo takhala ife pamaso panu, Yehova.
Ife tinali ndi pakati, ife tinamva zopweteka, tafanana ngati tabala mphepo; sitinachite chipulumutso chilichonse pa dziko lapansi; ngakhale okhala m'dziko lapansi sanagwe.
Akufa anu adzakhala ndi moyo; mitembo yao idzauka. Ukani muimbe, inu amene mukhala m'fumbi; chifukwa mame ako akunga mame a pamasamba, ndipo dziko lapansi lidzatulutsa mizimu.
Idzani, anthu anga, lowani m'zipinda mwanu, nimutseke pamakomo panu; nimubisale kanthawi kufikira mkwiyo utapita.
Pakuti taonani, Yehova adza kuchokera kumalo ake kudzazonda okhala pa dziko lapansi, chifukwa cha kuipa kwao; dziko lidzavumbulutsa mwazi wake, ndipo silidzavundikiranso ophedwa ake.
